==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|くつ|k1=くっ|ふく|k2=ぷく|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=くっぷく|屈服|tr={{IPAchar|/kɨut̚ bɨuk̚/}}|lit=bend; crouch + submit; obey}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} reading ''khiut-fu̍k''.

The modern reading ''kuppuku'' is a shift from earlier ''kutsubuku''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|くっぷく|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|屈伏}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|くっぷく}}

# [[surrender]], [[submission]], or [[subjection]] {{qualifier|as to a ruler or other authority}}
# [[prostration]], [[kowtowing]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|くっぷく}}

# to [[surrender]], [[submit]], or [[subject]] oneself {{qualifier|as to a ruler or other authority}}
# to [[prostrate]] oneself
